string-array.name: nice
string-array.item: Damn, I\'ve got nothing
Hating everything is so hard when the weather is so damn nice

string-array.name: rain
string-array.item: The best day to soak pedestrians with your car
I hope you forgot to replace your windshield wipers

string-array.name: snow
string-array.item: Need For Speed: Snow Drift
Not sure whats worse. The roads or your driving
God ran out of anti-dandruff shampoo

string-array.name: overcast
string-array.item: News 9 reports that basement dwellers everywhere are rejoicing
Solar panels are for assholes anyway
So much for that years supply of suntan lotion

string-array.name: storms
string-array.item: International \'Play with lightning rod\' Day
Flash Floods: They\'re like flash mobs, but with dangerous bodies of water
I can\'t tell if thats thunder or your mother finally getting out of bed

string-array.name: cold
string-array.item: Great day to swim in the pool
I hope you like cold pizza on delivery
Even when hell freezes over, it\'ll still be warmer there
You could probably break into a car with your nipples today

string-array.name: hot
string-array.item: Hotter than the asshole of a dying star
Go to hell! â€¦Seriously, it\'s not as hot there
Fry an egg on the sidewalk for that extra gravelly taste

string-array.name: fog
string-array.item: Sport of the day: Street Hockey
A good day for speeding to work
Can\'t see shit captain
